metadata.dcterms:title: First days in states of mask mandates
metadata.dcterms:creator: Jacobs, Philip
metadata.dcterms:description: This database contains the first day of a mask order for each state. There are two fields: (1) State name (2) Date of first mask mandate in state. The internet address which identified the source of data is embedded in Field 2.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Social Sciences
COVID-19 masks
